      by

            (Ioi (0 : exprℝ)) (r * (exprcexp) (-b * r ^ 2)) *

theorem integral_gaussian (b : exprℝ) :
    «expr∫ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∫ , »" (exp (-b * x ^ 2)) =
      sqrt (real.pi / b) :=
  by

  rcases le_or_lt b 0 with (hb | hb)
  · rw [integral_undef, sqrt_eq_zero_of_nonpos]

    · simpa only [not_lt, integrable_exp_neg_mul_sq_iff] using hb
  -- Assume now `b > 0`. Then both sides are non-negative and their squares agree.
  refine' (sq_eq_sq _ (sqrt_nonneg _)).1 _
  · exact integral_nonneg fun x => (exp_pos _).le

  convert integral_gaussian_sq_complex (by rwa [of_real_re] : 0 < (b : exprℂ).re)
  ext1 x
  rw [of_real_exp, of_real_mul, of_real_pow, of_real_neg]
#align integral_gaussian integral_gaussian

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `real.pi -/
/-- The special-value formula `Γ(1/2) = √π`, which is equivalent to the Gaussian integral. -/
theorem Gamma_one_half_eq : Gamma (1 / 2) = sqrt (real.pi) :=
  by
  -- first reduce to real integrals
  have hh : (1 / 2 : exprℂ) = ↑(1 / 2 : exprℝ) := by simp only [one_div, of_real_inv, of_real_bit0, of_real_one]
  have hh2 : (1 / 2 : exprℂ).re = 1 / 2 := by convert of_real_re (1 / 2 : exprℝ)
  replace hh2 : 0 < (1 / 2 : exprℂ).re := by
    rw [hh2]
    exact one_half_pos
  rw [Gamma_eq_integral _ hh2, hh, Gamma_integral_of_real, of_real_inj, real.Gamma_integral]
  -- now do change-of-variables
  rw [← integral_comp_rpow_Ioi_of_pos zero_lt_two]
  have :
    eq_on
      (fun x : exprℝ =>
        «expr • » (2 * x ^ ((2 : exprℝ) - 1)) (real.exp (-x ^ (2 : exprℝ)) * (x ^ (2 : exprℝ)) ^ (1 / (2 : exprℝ) - 1)))
      (fun x : exprℝ => 2 * real.exp (-1 * x ^ (2 : ℕ))) (Ioi 0) :=
    by
    intro x hx
    dsimp only
    have : (x ^ (2 : exprℝ)) ^ (1 / (2 : exprℝ) - 1) = x⁻¹ :=
      by
      rw [← rpow_mul (le_of_lt hx)]
      norm_num
      rw [rpow_neg (le_of_lt hx), rpow_one]
    rw [smul_eq_mul, this]
    field_simp [(ne_of_lt hx).symm]
    norm_num
    ring
  rw [set_integral_congr measurable_set_Ioi this, integral_mul_left, integral_gaussian_Ioi]
  field_simp
  ring
#align Gamma_one_half_eq Gamma_one_half_eq
